body.name: HP 330 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo - 2.4 Ghz Wireless USB Receiver - Chiclet Keys, 12 Keyboard Shortcuts - 1600 DPI Multi-Surface Mouse - LED Num Lock, Caps Lock, Scroll Lock (2V9E6AA)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 23 hrs 32 mins
features: CORDLESS FREEDOM - Cut the cord clutter with a wireless keyboard and mouse combo that lets you roam untethered thanks to a single 2.4 GHz wireless connection using simple USB-A receiver

STYLISH & COMFORTABLE – The ergonomically designed wireless keyboard with chiclet keycaps and number pad provides all-day typing comfort, while the USB wireless mouse features convenient left, right, and scroll wheel to keep your actions in complete control
KEYSTROKE OF GENIUS – Increase efficiency with this thin wireless keyboard's convenient top-row shortcut keys that activate 12 common functions with just a keypress
FREE YOUR MOUSE - Compact, portable wireless mouse features a 1600 dpi optical sensor for smooth, lag-free mouse tracking on virtually any surface (1) with astounding accuracy
LET THERE BE LED - Easy-to-see LED indicators illuminate the Num Lock, Caps Lock, and Scroll Lock keys so you can see what's on or off at a glance
body.description: Pick up and go with the HP 330 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo--the perfect wireless companions for wherever your journey takes you. Experience quieter, more comfortable computing without the distracting noise of mouse clicks and keystrokes with this ergonomic chiclet keyboard with numeric keypad and computer mouse. Reduce workspace clutter and say goodbye to tangled cords as you enjoy untethered 2.4GHz wireless connectivity (1) for both devices using a single USB receiver compatible with USB-A enabled laptop PCs and desktop computers. Work smarter and with fewer keystrokes thanks to convenient F1-F12 keyboard shortcuts that activate frequently used functions with just a keypress, while easy-to-see LED indicators illuminate the Num Lock, Caps Lock, and Scroll Lock keys so you can see what's on or off at a glance. Designed for all-day comfort, the wireless ergonomic mouse features multi-surface 1600 dpi optical sensor technology for smooth mouse tracking on virtually any surface (1), plus the 1600 dpi optical sensor gives you precise, accurate control of every click and selection for greater speed and efficiency. And thanks to its energy-efficient design, the HP 330 Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo keeps you productive all-day without interruption with 20+ months of battery life for the keyboard and 24+ months for the mouse using just 2 AAA batteries (2). (1) Does not track on glass. (2) Utilizes 2 AAA Batteries. Battery life based on 5 days week, 8 hours per day. Actual battery life will vary with use and environmental conditions and will naturally decrease with time and usage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keyboard and mouse
reviews.reviewText: great price, but I prefer heavy keys

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Know the Brand!
reviews.reviewText: Buy a known brand name! I first bought a cutesy cheap keyboard-it worked for a day!!! Hassle to send back. I then bought this HP keyboard and wireless mouse. works like it should! Couldn't be more pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick turn around without a glitch.
reviews.reviewText: Easy plug and play . Arrived virtually the next day. All keystrokes are positive without a glitch. My prior keyboard had a habit of missing spacer bar input leading to a lot of corrections. That's fixed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good price and value.
reviews.reviewText: I like HP products, but the mouse is a bit over-sensitive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Light weight, full keyboard, quality is cheap plastic for the mouse at least. If you drop the mouse on accident the top cover flies off and battery will pop out. But it gets the job done. I prefer hp products thats why I purchased it but next time I will got with a more expensive model or brand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Me gustó cumple con lo recomendado

reviews.reviewerName: Honduras Shipping and Crew Bureau S.A.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DON'T BUY IT
reviews.reviewText: This product does not work, I used it for a week and then it stopped working, I get a message that says that the USB device is not recognized by Windows, because it is malfunctioning or damaged. Don't buy it, it's throwing your money away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the keyboard. The battery life does run out quicker than I would like. The mouse is smaller than I prefer, and is very touchy. It doesn’t make any noise and the quality is decent for the price you pay.
